jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
We craft user-centric products and experiences, into - functional - beautiful and delightful interfaces. We work in an agile team environment, with developers, UX designers, and copywriters. We deliberate design decisions and translate any given user-experience journey into a smooth and intuitive interaction. Delight a user with micro-interactions that engaging our user without overdoing it.

Deep understanding of how computers and humans interact. Master the basics such as color, space, typography, hierarchy, and paddings & grids like the back of their hands. Familiar with the platform that they are building (iOS, Android, Web, etc.) — Sticklers for details. Understand design systems and how it works at scale. Unquestionable mastery over their tools.

Great interaction designers are the true backbones of any design team!

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Work with a certain product or internal Asphalt (our Design Language System) team: break screens into components and move the components to Asphalt, maintain and evolve Asphalt.
  • List out illustrations/icons/copywriting that is needed from the Creative Team
  • Create screens and transitions for Android, iOS, and Web
  • Work on creating internal tools for design efficiency
  • Building and handing over the prototypes to the Product Design Team for usability testing

• Strong sense of visual and interaction design, as well as deep understanding of human-computer interactions
  • Familiar with the product development process
  • Possess good knowledge of UI animations, transition and prototyping tools
  • Have knowledge in programming skills is a major plus!
